channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (short_term)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Kelly Chen @ Chase Center
item.description: 2025-12-20 04:00 — Kelly Chen at Chase Center. Kelly Chen's live shows are known for their high energy and emotional connection with fans, making this a highly anticipated event.

item.title: Not So Silent Night @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2025-12-15 03:00 — Not So Silent Night at SAP Center at San Jose. Not So Silent Night features a lineup of popular alternative acts, promising a diverse and exciting night for fans.

item.title: KATSEYE @ The Theater at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2025-12-06 04:00 → 2025-12-07 04:00 — KATSEYE at The Theater at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. KATSEYE's Beautiful Chaos Tour is generating buzz for its unique blend of performance art and music.

item.title: Public Service Broadcasting @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-04 04:00 — Public Service Broadcasting at The Fillmore. Public Service Broadcasting's innovative live shows combine music with visual storytelling, making for a captivating experience.

item.title: Motion City Soundtrack @ Warfield
item.description: 2025-12-06 03:30 — Motion City Soundtrack at Warfield. Motion City Soundtrack and Say Anything are both beloved bands with a strong following, promising a nostalgic night for fans.

item.title: The Mountain Goats @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-11 04:00 — The Mountain Goats at The Fillmore. The Mountain Goats are known for their storytelling and intimate performances, making this a must-see show.

item.title: Couch @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-12 04:00 — Couch at The Fillmore. Couch's BIG TALK Tour is attracting attention for its engaging live performances and relatable themes.

item.title: Waterparks @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-13 03:00 — Waterparks at The Fillmore. Waterparks' energetic performances and strong fan engagement make their Prowler Tour a highly anticipated event.

item.title: Alex Warren @ The Masonic
item.description: 2025-12-05 04:00 — Alex Warren at The Masonic. Alice 97.3's Alice in Winterland features a mix of popular artists, creating a festive atmosphere for attendees.

item.title: Jorma Kaukonen @ The Masonic
item.description: 2025-12-06 03:00 — Jorma Kaukonen at The Masonic. Jorma Kaukonen's 85th Birthday celebration is a unique opportunity to see a legendary musician perform live.

item.title: Pink Martini @ The Masonic
item.description: 2025-12-07 04:00 — Pink Martini at The Masonic. Pink Martini's All-Stars show promises a lively and diverse musical experience, appealing to a wide audience.

item.title: Yuri @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2025-12-05 04:30 — Yuri at San Jose Civic. Yuri's performance is expected to draw a large crowd, showcasing her popularity in the Latin music scene.

item.title: FLOW @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2025-12-06 05:00 — FLOW at San Jose Civic. FLOW's WORLD TOUR is likely to attract anime and J-Pop fans, making it a unique concert experience.

item.title: Nghtmre @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2025-12-21 04:00 — Nghtmre at San Jose Civic. NGHTMRE's MINDFULL TOUR is generating buzz in the electronic music scene, promising an exciting night for fans.

item.title: Key @ Paramount Theatre Oakland
item.description: 2025-12-06 04:00 — Key at Paramount Theatre Oakland. KEYLAND's UNCANNY VALLEY show is expected to offer a unique musical experience, appealing to indie music fans.

item.title: Mike Campbell & The Dirty Knobs @ Palace of Fine Arts
item.description: 2025-12-10 04:00 — Mike Campbell & The Dirty Knobs at Palace of Fine Arts. Mike Campbell & The Dirty Knobs' acoustic evening offers a chance to see a rock legend in an intimate setting.

item.title: The Bouncing Souls @ The UC Theatre
item.description: 2025-12-12 03:00 — The Bouncing Souls at The UC Theatre. The Bouncing Souls and H2O are both influential bands in the punk scene, promising a high-energy show.

item.title: Anna of the North @ The Independent
item.description: 2025-12-04 04:00 — Anna of the North at The Independent. Anna of the North's performance is highly anticipated due to her growing popularity in the indie pop scene.

item.title: Sydney Rose @ The Independent
item.description: 2025-12-05 04:00 — Sydney Rose at The Independent. Sydney Rose's show is gaining traction, appealing to fans of emerging indie artists.
